title: Valid Login with Correct Credentials
description: Verify that a user can successfully log in with valid username and password.

steps.expectedResult: Login form is displayed with username and password fields
User is redirected to the upload page

title: Login with Invalid Password
description: Verify that login fails with incorrect password and shows appropriate error.

steps.expectedResult: Error message 'Invalid username or password' is displayed

title: Login with Empty Fields
description: Verify that login form validates empty fields before submission.

steps.action: Leave username and password fields empty

steps.expectedResult: Sign In button is disabled or validation error is shown

title: Upload Valid PDF Document
description: Verify that a valid PDF file can be uploaded successfully.

steps.action: Drag and drop a valid .pdf file onto the dropzone
steps.expectedResult: File appears in the file list with a green checkmark

title: Reject Invalid File Type
description: Verify that uploading an unsupported file type shows an error.

steps.action: Drag and drop a .png image file onto the dropzone
steps.expectedResult: File appears in the file list with a red error indicator
Button remains disabled due to invalid file

title: Upload Multiple Valid Documents
description: Verify that multiple valid files can be uploaded at once.

steps.expectedResult: All files appear in the file list with green checkmarks
Processing animation begins for all files

title: Requirements Extraction Completes Successfully
description: Verify that the system extracts requirements from uploaded documents.

steps.action: Wait for 'Extracting requirements...' stage to complete
Navigate to Requirements page after processing
steps.expectedResult: Extracted requirements are displayed with ID, title, type, and priority

title: Test Case Generation from Requirements
description: Verify that test cases are generated from extracted requirements.

steps.expectedResult: Each test case has ID, title, type, priority, steps, and linked requirements

title: Processing Completes Within Performance Threshold
description: Verify that document processing completes within the 30-second threshold.

steps.action: Start a timer when processing begins

title: Traceability Matrix Coverage Calculation
description: Verify that the traceability matrix correctly calculates requirement coverage.
